Description: Make sure to check out my other 1000 guitars!!! Shipping to the lower 48 states Fedex,no PO Boxes.I will not ship anywhere else,Make sure to check out my other 100 guitars at my ebay store "Axes Bold As Love Guitars". Here is a very Daisy Rock "Rock Candy" electric guitar in a cool Super Girl Graphics finish.I know all you dudes say I can't play a guitar that was made with girls in mind,but these are very good guitars for this price range period. Guitar really does sound and play very good. I changed out the stock pickups for a pair of white humbuckers. Nice clean tones and snarls like a dog once you pour on the distortion.I did upgrade the tone capacitor from the standard ceramic to a Orange Drop style epoxy film cap.Really good tone with a smoother,broader response from the tone knob.Guitar is in excellent shape with only the mildest of surface swcratches,thats it,otherwise looks close to new.No fret wear on the very smooth jumbo frets.Grover style diecast Tuners. Here's some hype from Daisy Rock:.Daisy Rock Candy Graphic Super Guitar Girl The perfect beginning electric guitar for the aspiring rocker; Daisy Rock's Debutante Rock Candy Graphic electric guitar gives the budding female musician a full scale instrument made specifically with her needs in mind. Great eye-catching colors will inspire thousands of hours of playing, and the trademark Daisy Rock "Slim & Narrow" neck makes it easier for girls with smaller hands to play this rockin' axe! Plus, it has two humbucker pickups for multiple tonal options, 3-way toggle pickup selector switch, master tone control, tune-o-matic style bridge with stop bar, dazzling sparkle finish, and the lightweight body is super comfortable for girls to hold. Don't delay! Pick up the Debutante Rock Candy electric guitar today and start rocking the world! Construction: Bolt-On Body: Select Wood Neck: Maple Fingerboard: Rosewood Frets: 22 Medium Scale: 24 3/4" Inlay: Stars Bridge: Tune-O-Matic w/String Thru-Body Tuners: Die-Cast Chrome Hardware: Chrome Pickup: Hot White Humbuckers Electronics: Master Volume, Master Tone, 3-Way Selector Finish: Super Guitar Girl (14-7801) Weight: 6.75 lbs Blow up the pictures by clicking on them so you can see what I'm talking about. I'm cleaning out my shop so check back for all kinds of other parts in the near future. I only ship fully insured to the lower 48 states,and nowhere else. I describe all guitars to the best of my abilities.I don't take every guitar apart to check every freaking screw.I disclose all pimples just so there are no misunderstandings.All guitars are sold as is. Insurance is included in my shipping and handling charges.I will not ship out of the U.S. My feedback is public record,and I aim to keep it good. I will no longer do local pickups period. Make sure to look at all pictures carefully,ask all question before you bid! All sales are final,and there will be no refunds, or returns unless you can prove an item was grossly misrepresented. Consider this a contract if you bid. Sorry it has to be like that,blame the clever scam artist that spend all their time trying to beat somebody,instead of working. Most deliveries will require adult signature.
